verses.verse: <S%G3704>That<s%> the <S%G2842>communication<s%> of <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> may <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G1756>powerful<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> the <S%G1922>acknowledging<s%> of <S%G3956>every<s%> good <S%G18>thing<s%> which <S%G3588>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>.

<S%G1352>Therefore<s%>, though I might <S%G2192>be<s%> <S%G4183>very<s%> <S%G3954>bold<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> to <S%G2004>command<s%> <S%G4671>you<s%> that which is <S%G433>appropriate<s%>,

Yet <S%G1223>for<s%> <S%G26>love<s%>'s <S%G1223>sake<s%> <S%G3870>I<s%> <S%G3123>rather<s%> <S%G3870>beg<s%> <S%G5607>you<s%>, being such a <S%G5108>one<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> the <S%G4246>aged<s%>, <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G3570>now<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> a <S%G1198>prisoner<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.

<S%G3739>Whom<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1014>would<s%> have <S%G2722>retained<s%> <S%G4314>with<s%> <S%G1683>me<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G5228>in<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G5228>place<s%> he might have <S%G1247>ministered<s%> unto <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G1199>bonds<s%> of the <S%G2098>gospel<s%>:

Not <S%G3765>now<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> a <S%G1401>servant<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G5228>above<s%> a <S%G1401>servant<s%>, a <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G27>beloved<s%>, <S%G3122>especially<s%> to <S%G1698>me<s%>, <S%G1161>but<s%> how <S%G4214>much<s%> <S%G3123>more<s%> unto <S%G4671>you<s%>, <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>?

<S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> have <S%G1125>written<s%> it with my <S%G1699>own<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%>, <S%G1473>I<s%> will <S%G661>repay<s%> <S%G2443>it<s%>: although I <S%G3004>do<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> to <S%G4671>you<s%> <S%G3754>how<s%> you <S%G4359>owe<s%> to <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> your own <S%G4572>self<s%> <S%G4359>besides<s%>.

Having <S%G3982>confidence<s%> <S%G5218>in<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G5218>obedience<s%> I <S%G1125>wrote<s%> to <S%G4671>you<s%>, <S%G1492>knowing<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> you will <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> more <S%G5228>than<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%>.

<S%G1161%G99999>But<s%> <S%G2090>prepare<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> a <S%G3578>lodging<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> I <S%G1679>trust<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4335>prayers<s%> I shall be <S%G5483>restored<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%>.

The <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> be <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%>. <S%G281>Amen<s%>. Written from Rome to Philemon, by Onesimus, a servant.
